AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025 - Apply for 02 Project Research Scientist and Other Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 20, 2025, 10:05 IST
 All India Institute of Medical Science
 2 Jobs |  Posted On : 20-Aug-2025 |  Uttarakhand |  Salary : 35,000 to 45,000




FOLLOW

All India Institute of Medical Sciences Rishikesh (AIIMS Rishikesh) has released the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Research Scientists and Project Technical Support Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MVSc, BDS, BAMS, Post Graduation, Diplome, Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Uttarakhand.

AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025  - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Project Research Scientist	01	MBBS, MVSc, BDS, BAMS
Project Technical Support 	01	 Post Graduation, Diplome, Ph.D

Age Limit for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 40 years.

Selection Process for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 35,000 /- per month
The Maximum Salary: Rs. 45,000 /- per month.

Application fee for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the AIIMS Rishikesh Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Project Research Scientist notification 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the email address given below.

Email Address

icmr.ayushrish@gmail.com

Important Dates

Staring Date of Application	14-08-2025
Last Date of Application	31-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
